description: A mule-sized, quadrupedal robot designed for commercial and military use.  Capable of carrying fairly heavy loads for its size, autonomously stumbling about and surveying the terrain with its various cameras.  Not very useful after the apocalypse, unless it has been reprogrammed to receive commands from a new user.

This is an inactive hauler bot for commercial and military use, able to autonomously carry up to 75 kilograms (165 pounds).  Using this item involves placing it on the ground and turning it on.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the hauler bot will respond to future commands, serving as a lightweight robotic packmule.
